amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the HOME Investment Partnership by $200 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Home Investment Partnership Program by $200 million and to apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 242 (Roll no. 436).
